projectGridLines.title: KPMG
projectGridLines.description:
We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented intern to join our Government Advisory team, focusing

on Education and Skilling. This role provides a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience in policy

analysis, project management, and strategic planning within the government sector. The intern will

assist in research, data analysis, and the development of recommendations to enhance educational and

skilling initiatives.

Key Responsibilities:

- Research and Analysis

- Conduct comprehensive research on education and skilling policies, programs, and best practices.

- Analyze data and trends to support policy recommendations and project planning.

- Prepare reports, policy briefs, and presentations based on research findings.

- Project Support:

- Assist in the planning, coordination, and implementation of education and skilling projects.

- Collaborate with team members and stakeholders to ensure project objectives are met.

- Support the development and monitoring of project timelines, deliverables, and budgets.

- Stakeholder Engagement:

- Assist in organizing meetings, workshops, and consultations with government officials, educational

institutions, and other stakeholders.

- Document and summarize key discussions and action items from stakeholder engagements.

- Administrative Tasks:

- Provide administrative support to the team, including scheduling meetings, managing

communications, and maintaining project documentation.

- Assist in preparing materials for presentations, meetings, and other events.
